CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 27, 1959, page A3, reads: "Outstanding Worker - 'Sir Walter,' popular radio announcer, receives a Certificate of Merit from the NAACP national office for his outstanding work during the 1959 membership campaign. The award is made by Gaines Bradford, co-chairman of the drive. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Gaines Bradford handing Certificate of Merit from NAACP 1959 membership drive to radio broadcaster John "Sir Walter" Christian
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Gymnasiums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Radio broadcasters--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Bradford, Gaines.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
